QuestData.Title: Rank and File
QuestData.Description: First things first; let's kill us some crusaders.$B$BAnd when I say kill the Scarlet Crusade, I mean wipe them out, root and branch, rank and file.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 50 members of the Scarlet Crusade within the Scarlet Halls.
QuestData.CompletionText: You know, I've been killing the ones that you can't see behind closed doors.$B$BBut I need to maintain this disguise. So if you could just take care of all of the ones out there in the open, that'd be great.
QuestData.RewardText: Great start, $p!$B$BIt won't be long now before the Scarlet Crusade is nothing more than an ugly footnote in the annals of history.
